p: For the antibacterial activity, E. coli NCTC 9001, S. Typhimurium NCTC 12023, and S. aureus NCTC 6571 (SIGMA-ALDRICH) were grown on Brain Heart Infusion Broth (BHI Broth), (OXOID), at 37 °C for 24 h. As for the antifungal activity, A. niger (SIGMA-ALDRICH) was grown on Potato Dextrose Agar (PDA), (BIOlab), at 22 °C for 5 days [ 35].
